FuncDef: This command enables the debug for XMPP messages sent or received by the 7750 SR, 7450 ESS, or 7950 XRS.
CLIs: xmpp [ connection ] [ gateway ] [ message ] [ vsd ] [ iq ] [ all ]

ParaDef.Info: Filters only the messages related to the XMPP connection.
Filters the messages related to the gateway.
Filters the IQ messages between the gateway and the VSD.
